hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said:'The Prophet was asked about a man who forgets prayer or sleeps and misses it. He said: 'he performs it when he remembers it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ نَامَ عَنِ الصَّلاَةِ، أَوْ نَسِيَهَا
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Sleeps Through Prayer Or Forgets it
